name: OR_LOG_PREOP_LVLS
description: The table stores the details about the Pre-op acuity levels documented for a patient in a surgical log.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PREOP_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description: The Pre-op acuity level category value for a given time interval in the surgical log.

columns.name: PREOP_TIME
columns.description: The amount of time a patient was documented as having a Pre-op acuity level in a surgical log.
